name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wow picker - A Simple Color Picker

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One Click Simple color picker Chrome browser extension, 
This color picker chrome extension is simple and quickly copy the color code of any browser, tab, and pc window in just one click. 

Advantages: 
> It can copy from any tab
> It can copy color from any window of pc
> Works on Mac, Linux and WIndows PC Laptop
